name: Decoda Health
headline: Patient Billing Made Simple
description: Decoda Health centralizes communications between healthcare clinics and patients along with a comprehensive payments platform. Our platform makes it easy for patients to communicate with their healthcare providers and pay for services all in one place.
tags: industry:messaging; industry:digital-health; industry:healthcare-it; industry:billing; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

## Empower Agents with built in modules for a digital patient experience.

## Decoda handles the routine, so you can focus on what matters.

Solutions
## Our comprehensive suite of solutions.
[AI Front Desk](https://decodahealth.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)[Payments](https://decodahealth.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)[Scheduling & Intake](https://decodahealth.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-2>)[Engagement](https://decodahealth.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-3>)[Note-taking](https://decodahealth.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-4>)
Swipe to see all
Arrow Right
Icon
AI Front Desk
Reduce call volume by 70%
Automatically handles calls about anything from scheduling appointments to medication refills
Speaks many languages
Get language support in ~25 languages. English, Spanish, Arabic, French, Hindi, and more to name a few.
Available 24/7
Missing appointments with after hour calls? Be there for your patients at anytime.
Tailored for you
Train once and update knowledge in seconds, whenever you need.
Icon
> The goal of the AI receptionist wasn’t to replace us answering the phones, but if it handles 60-70% of the calls well then dadgummit that’s awesome. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67088817b6e65486dfaf833b/6716fe47316be4d9d48653c1_profile%2003.jpg)
Dr. Ghannam, CEO
After Hours Urgent Care
Icon
Payments
Unified payment channels
Accept payments in person, over the phone, via text, online, and more—all seamlessly connected
Explain bills
Provide itemized, easy-to-understand breakdowns of bills over the phone
Automate workflows
Set up payment plans, subscriptions, and automate outstanding balance outreach
Access zero fees
Pass credit card fees to customers and save up to 3%
Icon
> Decoda has developed a product that empowers us to optimize revenue capture through its user-friendly payment platform.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67088817b6e65486dfaf833b/6716fe47c6301611b56ef17e_profile%2004.jpg)
Dr. Nemil Shah, CEO
Approxie Urgent Care
Icon
Scheduling & Intake
Schedule Seamlessly
Let patients book online, over text, or by calling AI and send reminders automatically. Save 50% of front desk time
Custom Forms
Capture consent, card on files, and create unlimited variations of forms for your needs
Preference Management
Dynamically manage provider preferences and approve appointments during preferred times
Accurate Intake
Validate insurance, address, and phone numbers to reduce claim denials up front
Icon
> Decoda streamlined our scheduling and intake process, saving us time and enhancing patient experience effortlessly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67088817b6e65486dfaf833b/6719b30f732dbb1b4683e28e_profile%2005b.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67088817b6e65486dfaf833b/6716fe47c09485450d16e835_profile%2006.jpg)
Haven Brolsma, CEO
Wellness by Approxie
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67088817b6e65486dfaf833b/671afe10c6bc4b994cfd6576_solution%20engagement%203.webp)
Icon
Engagement
Centralize Communications
Access 2 way SMS, emails, eFaxes, inbound & outbound calling from one platform
Improve Reputation
Proactively seek reviews, enact feedback, and improve reputation online
Personalize Engagement
Track what people are reaching out about and automate responses with AI across all channels
Mail Paper
Send and track paper mail across 50 states without lifting a finger.
Icon
> Texts to landlines fail. Decoda helped us automate outbound collections calls with AI & recovered 15X more money than we paid them.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67088817b6e65486dfaf833b/6716fe47b36817cc8b4486c3_profile%2007.jpg)
Michael Lindke, Office Manager
Vascular & Endovascular Associates
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67088817b6e65486dfaf833b/671afe0f8b587e3b5f932675_solution%20compliance%203.webp)
Icon
Note-taking
Personalize Your Style
AI that learns your note-taking style over time to sound more like you
Multilingual
Encounters that are translated automatically, like magic
BYO Template
Bring your own template or select from preset options.
Forms & Docs
Write letters and handover patients in seconds.
Icon
> The AI scribe is a game-changer—accurate, efficient, and saves time, allowing us to focus more on patient care.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67088817b6e65486dfaf833b/6716fe47c6301611b56ef17b_profile%2008.jpg)
Dr. Babar Qadri, CEO
Integrative Medicine Clinic

generated_description:
**Decoda Health: Simplifying Patient Billing in Healthcare**

Founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, Decoda Health is on a mission to make patient billing simpler and more accessible. The company emerged from the Y Combinator Batch S23 and currently operates with a lean team of just four employees, led by their Group Partner, Nan.

Decoda Health launched with an innovative platform that centralizes communications between healthcare clinics and patients while providing a comprehensive payments solution. With its tagline "Patient Billing Made Simple," the company offers a user-friendly interface where patients can communicate with their healthcare providers and handle payments all in one place. You can check them out at [decodahealth.com](https://decodahealth.com/).

### What They Do

Decoda Health focuses on a suite of features designed to enhance the healthcare experience for both patients and providers:

1. **AI Front Desk**: Automates patient interactions, reducing call volumes dramatically while enhancing scheduling and FAQs. It supports multiple languages and operates around the clock.
   
2. **Payments**: Streamlines payment processes, allowing for transactions anywhere—whether in-person, over the phone, or online. It even simplifies invoice explanations and automates follow-ups on outstanding balances.
   
3. **Scheduling & Intake**: Enables efficient patient booking online and via text, with automated reminders that save significant front desk time. They also manage custom forms and validate important details to reduce claim denials.
   
4. **Engagement**: Facilitates two-way communication via SMS, email, and calls, while helping clinics maintain a solid online reputation through proactive review management.
   
5. **Note-taking**: Utilizes AI to assist in note-taking during patient interactions, allowing providers to focus more on care rather than paperwork.

### Results Oriented

Decoda Health is not just about offering services; they’re about delivering concrete results:
- **1.5X increase in patient appointments**
- **30% boost in patient payments**
- **80% reduction in check-in/check-out times**
- An impressive **98% patient satisfaction rate**.

### A Future-Forward Health Solution

Backed by notable investors and incorporating cutting-edge AI technology, Decoda Health is building a robust platform aimed at transforming healthcare interactions. Their solutions are designed not just to streamline processes, but to empower medical practices so they can focus on what genuinely matters: patient care.

In an industry ripe for disruption, Decoda Health’s proactive approach could just be the innovation needed to help healthcare providers and patients navigate the complexities of billing and communication. So, if you’re healthcare savvy, or just interested in how AI is revolutionizing patient interactions, Decoda Health is definitely one to keep an eye on.
